Package controller

Package controller is one of the basic module of the dieting-chatbot project.

See: Description

Package controller Description

Package controller is one of the basic module of the dieting-chatbot project. It servers us the wrapper and I/O interface of LINE API, and tracks the global state of a session of user interaction. Messages from user and from the chatbot engine are exchanged through EventBus under reactor framework.
